text: Iâ€™ve had several disappointing experiences at this store. Some of the staff at the counter, particularly a Malay and an Indian lady who wear heavy makeup, have been quite rude. They often leave expired promotional tags on the shelves, which is very misleading. On multiple occasions, I picked up items thinking they were on offer, only to be told at the counter that the promotion had ended. When I pointed out the offer label still displayed on the rack, the Malay lady staff removed it abruptly, saying it expired yesterday, without any apology. This is not only careless but also quite unethical. I hope the management takes this seriously and trains the staff to be more professional and customer-friendly.

Shitty store manager. Changed the operating hours without noticing online or being noticeably seen on the board. Now is 7am to 11pm. Not 24hrs anymore. So inconvenient. Losing clients. That is your policy? It sucks.
Staff are great but service speed was terrible.. only one poor fellow was manning the cashier so when something went wrong.. the queue stucked

A good Giant Express that sells everything including COVID-19 Test Kits; no self-checkout counter here.

The vegetables section here is quite large and you can pick and choose your asparagus etc.

Staff are friendly however maybe due to lack of staff, lots of food that are rotten was not cleared and still sitting on shelves.
Food mostly rotten due to the open concepts fridge . Need to think twice before i make Ny purchase afraid food is contaminate.
